member.name: T:NTypewriter.Internals.Functions.DebugFunctions
member.summary: Set of functions that can be helpful during bug hunting

member.name: M:NTypewriter.Internals.Functions.LINQFunctions.Where(NTypewriter.Internals.MainTemplateContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: Filters a sequence of values based on a predicate. Predicate uses C# lambda syntax, the same one that is used by LINQ Where method
